class_notes:
"EMPH Students Only; Outside permission to enroll in course must be approved by EMPH leadership. 
EMPH Opening Weekend is January 13-15  and Closing Weekend is April 14-16 ."
course_description: This course is an introduction to the SAS programming environment. This is an applied computer course that instructs students in the techniques needed to enter data into a database and properly read and process data into a final dataset that is ready for epidemiologic analysis.
prerequisites: BIOS 516D and AEPI 530D as prerequisites or special permission required to enroll.
schedule_location:
F 4pm-7pm in R. Randall Rollins Bldg. R201
Su 8:30am-11:30am in R. Randall Rollins Bldg. R201
